body.name: Elegant Candle Lamp with Bulbs, Timer and Dimmer - Compatible with All Jar Candles for Scented Wax Melting - Amber Glass Candle Warmer for Home Decoration
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 55 mins
features: 🎁【ELEGANT HOME DECOR】-Comes with warm white 2 x 50 watt GU10 bulb to create a cozy atmosphere and cast nice ambient light, eliminating the fatigue and bring you a happiness and soothing at the end of the day, also a nice elegant home decoration. Complement any area in your home or office.

⏰【TIMER 2H/4H/8H】-Our candle warmer lamp can be turned off by timer feature 2H/4H/8H, don't need to worry about forgetting the heating time while enjoying the fragrance, with peace of mind sleep and play anytime. The cord is 5ft long and the shade is 5.5 inches from the base to fit sizes of jar candles.

🌟【DIMMER 7-LEVEL BRIGHTNESS】-Our candle melting lamp can be dimmer 7 level of brightness from 0-100 by switch, adjust the temperature for melting the candle. The higher brightness the faster melting speed, scented the fastest and strongest fragrance. 2900K color temperature, 90+CRI.

🎁【FLAMELESS ENJOY THE SCENT】-Our candle wax warmer lamp especially suitable for children's and pet families, no smoke or no open flame for home, apartments and offices use. Always keep the candle jar flat and beautiful, prolong the candle use life and avoiding safety hazards caused by candle burning. Compatible most size Jar Candles.

🎁【BEST GIFTS】-An excellent choice for personal use and gift, show your love to your families, lover, friends or fragrance lovers on Valentine's Day, Thanksgiving, Father's Day, Mother's Day, Christmas, New Year, Housewarming or other occasions. Using our melting wax lamp can easily remove unpleasant smells such as pet urine and kitchen waste, and refresh the space.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Electric Heating No-flameNo-sootNo-smoke Enjoy YOGA Releases Fragrance Engulf Your Area Relaxing and enjoy your stretch time Office Lamp Children's familiesPet familiesApartmentsOffices Night Lamp Dimmer 7 BrightnessTimer 2H/4H/8H Next page 1 Home Decor 2 Releases Fragrance 3 Office Fragrance 4 Dimmer & Timer

How Is The Candle Warmer Lamp Work? Heat and melt the candle by adjusting the brightness of lamp, the candle melts and releases the fragrance during the heating process without open flame.Heating from top to bottom of candle wax melting lamp can always keep the candle pool flat and beautiful.A perfect way to prolong candle use life. Product Design 3CM lamp base, sturdy and stylish.The candle warmer lamp base has groove position to hold candle for easy placement of 5.5 inch * 3.8 inch candles, compatible most size Jar Candles.1.5M lamp cord. Plug and play anywhere.

Sweet Tips The higher brightness adjustment, scent go faster and thicker.No need to light the candle with an open flame, just dim the brightness which heat the candle to release the fragrance. The perfect way to prolong the candle use life.After heating 5 times, it is recommended to pour the upper layer of wax oil in order to continue to volatilize the fragrance.Timing 2H/ 4H/ 8H, saving energy while prolong the candle lifespan. Easy to Use Install the GU10 halogen lamp bulb inside the lampshade.Plug connection power supply, 120V power.Choose your favorite scented candle with a maximum candle size of 5.5 inches in height and 3.8 inches in diameter.Dimmer brightness to adjust the speed and intensity of the aromatherapy by button controls. Fragrance can spread throughout the room within 5 minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So beautiful and works well!
reviews.reviewText: I had low expectations because you just never know. But this is so beautiful! I love that it has a timer on it and different levels of brightness. Works well and my room smells so good quick!! I will definitely be purchasing another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy and functional AF
reviews.reviewText: Looooove this lamp! I wasn’t sure what to expect but this little lamp is so pretty and warms the room (not literally, but visually). The candle scent fills the space without having to have any open flames. The timer on the lamp is great for people (like me) who forget to turn things off 🤦🏻‍♀️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functional and beautiful!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my 11-year-old who always asks to light candles in her room (no). She loves it so much - and so do I! It’s really beautiful - the pics don’t do it justice - and I love that it still gives the effect of a candle without the fire hazard. Her room always smells so nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for the price
reviews.reviewText: I would have given it a 5-star rating but there are just 2 teeny things I have an issue with. The good things are its a chic light with a purpose. The price was very good for what you get however I noticed the base of the lamp is not level, so it wobbles a bit, to fix I put a small piece of folded paper, and it stops the wobble. I also noticed the light was a smidge of center but by much. The warmer works very well and I have used a few different wax candles, and they all have a great scent throw. Overall, I would say 4 / 5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I adore this candle lamp. It’s been one of my best purchases all year. I love the timer feature and the brightness control. I mainly use Bath and Body Works 3 wick candles and they fit the base generously. I’ve always had great scent throw from my candles using this lamp. It looks so pretty on my desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s beautiful and when it works it’s perfect. I noticed a few times the light would flicker when turned on and sometimes it would stay off. I’d have to turn off the lamp and fiddle with the bulb to get it to stay on. I’ve used this maybe 2 weeks total since I received it a month ago and today the first bulb flickered and then would not turn on. I caved and pulled out the replacement bulb that came with the lamp and it worked right away so not sure if the one bulb is defective but 40 or so hours of use shouldn’t kill a bulb - and I never used it on the highest setting

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this lamp, it's beautiful and I can smell my candles throughout downstairs. The glass does not get overly hot. Timer is a huge help! Plan on getting another one for a different part of the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First of all, super cute and aesthetic design. I am extremely pleased with this product especially the fact that I didn’t know that there was different brightness settings and even better. There’s a timer! I have it on a two hour timer right now before I go to bed, and within the first, 10 minutes of having the lamp on, I could start to smell my candle! Amazing product.

This is the coolest invention ever! I love candles and there are always so much wax left after it’s been burned out. I often had to boil water just to get it all. I like that it has a timer and you can set the brightness. This is one of my top favourite purchases!!! Love my lamp
I love this lamp, it looks beautiful and exudes a relaxing atmosphere in my home. 10/10 would recommend!
Description on site it correct , does not include light bulb for lamp .
